mapper.sql: select a.id, a.project_id as "project.id", b.name as "project.name", b.status as "project.status", a.user_id as "user.userId", c.user_name as "user.userName", a.status from task_project_user a left join task_project b on a.project_id = b.id left join sys_user c on a.user_id = c.user_id
mapper.select: select a.id, a.project_id as "projectId", b.name as "projectName", a.status, c.user_name as "userName" from task_project_user a left join task_project b on a.project_id = b.id left join sys_user c on b.duty_id = c.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.status = 0
mapper.update: update task_project_user set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
